text: "Candy" is a 1999 pop ballad by musician Mandy Moore. The song has a melody and tune similar to Robyn's "Do You Know (What it Takes). The song was the lead single of Mandy's first record So Real. The song was released in August 1999. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:1999 songs Category:Mandy Moore songs
title: Candy (Mandy Moore song)
